name: an FPS...,but without graphics
description:
This is my entry for 2018 GMTK Game Jam. It is an FPS made for DOS, but with a twist: There are no graphics, just oldschool CGA text, which give you all the information you need. It should work on any pc with atleast a CGA card, or in DOSBox. This is porbably also the smallest entry 2kb without music, 3kb with music

You are in a maze with five lines of text:

Location: a vector representing your location in said maze                                                               Forward: Wall, path or the Enemy (in Red)                                                                                                 Right: See forward                                                                                                                                                    Left: See right                                                                                                                                                                 Score: your kills, the enemies kills

Controles: W,S move forwards, backwards

A,D turn Left, Right (90 degrees)

Q shoot
